1: Those who trust in the Lord are like Mount Zion. It cannot be shaken. It will stand forever.
2: As Jerusalem is surrounded by mountains, so the Lord surrounds his people from now to eternity.
3: No, the scepter of wickedness will not rest on the land assigned to the righteous, so that the righteous do not reach out their hands toward evil.
4: Do good, O Lord, for the good and for those who are upright in their hearts.
5: But those who turn to their crooked ways— the Lord will send them away with the evildoers. Peace be on Israel.
